headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://aframe.io https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' https://fonts/googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' blob:; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; worker-src 'self';
